vsParam:
Ah, it's Cresson... and all other guards.
It seems noisy there. What's happening?

Oh, it's [px] and you. A massive space-time distortion
showed up in front of Ruhuna Village.

Monsters may come out of it.
We're warning people not to come near the village.

You guys should stay away from it too. It's highly risky.
But...

There's a strange girl near it.
She refuses to leave.

A girl? Who might she be?
[px], anyway, let's go there to have a look?

Wait! I just told you not to come near it!
I'm as worried about that girl as you, but it's too risky.

Haha, no worries! [px] will take care of it
even if any accident happens ♪

Yeah, Sorel is right!
Isn't she, [px]?

Haha, I just can't talk you out of going...
All right. I'll go with you!

OK, deal!
Oh, right, can we take some snacks with us?
Hey, let me get this straight. We're not going there for fun...

From now on, the "Ambrosia Flower" is in your custody.
Please take good care of this flower of "Fire" and "Wind".

Your parents protected this flower for 500 years.
Now it's your turn.

Hee hee, sis, no need to get too nervous.
It's no big deal to keep a flower!

Hehe, really?
Lycoris, I wish your vibrancy would rub off on this flower.

Make sure to keep this in mind.
Never, ever let the "Ambrosia Flower" perish.

If this flower perishes...
the "Fairyland of Flowers" will perish too.

It's of great significance to take care of the "Ambrosia Flower".
Don't take it as any ordinary flower.

Plus, the Ambrosia Flower comes with strong magic power.
That makes it a likely target for monsters. You know that, right?

Make sure to always stay sharp.
Radiata, Lycoris.

G-got it, uncle!
We'll keep it alive with great care. You have our promise.

OK! It's all down to you. Your target is to
cultivate the Ever-nutrient Soil in 500 years.

With the Ever-nutrient Soil, you can
pass your job onto the next generation. Understood?
Lycoris, let's set off for flower fertilizer!

OK, sis!
Oh, right, can I bring snacks with me?
Yeah, sure! Bring as many as you want!

Yeah~ It's such a good day, Lycoris!
Let's get deeper into it today?

Ah, sis! Maybe this could be used as fertilizer!
Let's get some back! Oh, there's some over there too!

Ah, wait for me, Lycoris!
Don't go too far away from me!

Lycoris? Gosh, where is she?
Lycoris, Lycoris!!

Uh, it's odd? What's going on...
I-I feel sleepy suddenly...
